ygData.subject: Re: Praise Bertoxxulous
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Brother: Ive done the exact same thing. Including poor Brother Trintle. I believe the other 2 NPCs that hangout by that same tree arent part of the quest.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Brother:

Ive done the exact same thing. Including poor Brother Trintle.
I believe the other 2 NPCs that hangout by that same tree arent part of
the quest. I too have turned in their beads and received nothing.
As far as I know its the NPCs that you always see running on that path.
Ive only killed one of them, and no beads or amulets were dropped.
I havent gotten around to trying it again, though.
And you can bet that doing this quest will drop your faction with the
guards, temple of life and house of thunder. This is the only reason i
havent kept trying it. Ive done alot of naughty things, and life was
getting complicated in Qeynos, so i had to lay off that quest for a
bit.
As soon as i get around to trying it again though, i'll post what
happens.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
